short_description: Ultra Brightness LED: This car underglow strip lights adopt 256pcs SMD 5050 LED chips. Output brighter and more uniform. RGBIC Chips perfectly present the chase effect. Enhance the look of your car and enhance the feel of your driving experience.

The remote control has 4 static lighting modes, preset Jump and preset fading patterns, 8 sound active modes and even more for you to explore. Both app and remote make you select your ideal color.

IP 67 Waterproof & Strong adhesive: IP67 waterproof, protect the LED strips to work well. In addition, strong adhesive and cable ties ensure stable installation. Even driving through lots of rain, highway speeds, potholes, the LED strips can still stay on and work great. Please clean down the dust, oil, and water before installing, the adsorption force will be stronger.

Easy Installation: You can power the strip lights by positive and negative power cable. The strong adhesive tap and mounting hardware (screws, snaps and zip ties) can keep the light strips from falling off. Ensure it to be installed stably. The neon underglow kit fit for any 12V automotive cars, trucks, RVs, SUVs, Campers etc. And it can also be used in a variety of interior & exterior applications of the cars.

name: 8Pods RGB LED Rock Lights for Jeep Trucks Golf Cart ATV UTV RZR SUV Offroad, Multicolor Underglow Light Kit with APP/RF Remote Dual Zone Neon Vehicle Accent Underbody Light 12V Waterproof
short_description: Vivid and Powerful Multicolor RGB Lighting for Maximum Impact: Each LD DARKEAGLE multicolor RGB rock light for Jeep features 128 high-intensity SMD 3528 chips, delivering a vibrant, wide-angle glow that enhances wheel-well and underbody visibility. Whether you're cruising, off-roading, or showcasing your vehicle, the vivid multicolor RGB underglow ensures your ride stands out day or night with 16 million color options and dynamic illumination.

3 Control Methods & 16 Million Colors + 23 Dynamic Modes: Customize your lighting freely using the mobile app (compatible with both iOS & Android), 24-key RF remote, or 4-key keychain remote. Choose from 16 million RGB colors and 23 dynamic effects, including breathing mode, flashing, music sync, voice-control mode, speed/brightness adjustment, timer setting, and more. Whether cruising, off-roading, or attending night events, you can create fully personalized lighting that perfectly matches your style.

IP67 Waterproof & Built for Extreme Conditions: Designed for mud, rain, snow, and rugged off-road terrain, these RGB rock lights maintain reliable performance in any environment. With a long 50,000-hour lifespan, they deliver consistent illumination for trucks, ATVs, UTVs, and off-road adventures in all seasons.

Dual-Zone Control for Fully Personalized Lighting: Take your Trucks lighting to the next level with Dual-Zone Control, supported only via the 24-key or 4-key RF remotes. Independently adjust the left/right zones or front/rear zones, allowing different colors, dynamic modes, or effects on each side of your bike. Whether you want a subtle underglow on one side, a vibrant show on the other, or a creative combination for night rides, group cruises, or exhibitions, Dual-Zone Control gives you unmatched flexibility and personalization that single-zone kits can’t offer.

Easy Installation Plug-and-Play - Pre Wired & Universal Fit for 12V Vehicles: The multi color rgb rock lights for jeep package includes all the accessories needed for installing RGB LED rock lights, including 4 pieces of 78.74-inch extension wires, allowing you to place rgb rock lights on your truck at a greater distance to accommodate various vehicles. It also comes with self-tapping screws, zip ties, heat shrink wire connectors, fuses, and more, making it ideal for installation in Jeep, Trucks, Golf Carts, Pickup, ATV, UTV, RZR, Side By Side, SXS, Four Wheeler, Can-Am, Off-road, RV,Toyota, Tacoma, Snowmobile, Semi truck, Boat, Tractor, and other vehicle models with 12v DC power sources

Smart Brake Warning & Intelligent Energy-Saving for Safety and Efficiency: Our Smart Brake Warning System makes your vehicle more visible by turning the lights red when you brake, providing an extra alert to nearby drivers, especially in low-visibility conditions. At the same time, the Intelligent Energy-Saving feature automatically shuts off the lights 30 seconds after the engine is turned off, protecting your battery and extending its life. Enjoy added safety and efficient power management all in one system.

Integrated Fuse Protection & Illuminated Power Switch for Electrical Safety: This RGB rock lights kit features an inline fuse to help protect your vehicle’s electrical system from overloads or short circuits during operation. The power switch is equipped with a red indicator light that illuminates only when the system is powered on, providing clear visual confirmation of working status—especially useful in low-light environments. Built with quality copper-core wiring, the kit ensures stable current transmission, reduced voltage loss, and reliable performance for off-road driving, long trips, and daily use.

Underbody Protection & Enhanced Visibility: These underglow RGB rock lights improve nighttime visibility and help you inspect your vehicle’s undercarriage after off-roading. The bright illumination disperses animals, reduces collision risks, and improves safety in fog, rain, or low-light environments while making your vehicle easier to locate in crowded areas.
